translation: The faith of each is in accordance with their nature, O Arjuna. People consist of their faith; as a person's faith is, so are they.
commentary: 17.3 Sattvanurupa in accordance with his nature? of all of each? Shraddha faith? becomes is? India O Arjuna? faithful consists of (his) faith? This is this? The man is man? who who? Yachchraddhah in which his faith is? He he? Eve verily? He that (is).Commentary The faith of every person conforms to his inherent nature or natural temperament. Man is imbued with faith.
